content:
As a developer, I want the security team to get Hashicorp Vault up and running for our Kubernetes clusters, so that we can securely manage and store our secrets.

Acceptance Criteria:

* The security team has successfully installed and configured Hashicorp Vault on our Kubernetes clusters.
* The security team has created and configured necessary policies for different roles and applications accessing the secrets.
* The security team has successfully integrated Hashicorp Vault with Kubernetes, so that our applications running on Kubernetes can retrieve secrets from Vault.
* The security team has tested the integration thoroughly to ensure that secrets are being securely retrieved and used by our applications.
* The security team has documented the installation, configuration, and integration steps in a clear and concise manner so that it can be easily understood and replicated by other members of the team.
* The security team has set up monitoring and alerting to ensure that any issues with the Hashicorp Vault setup are detected and addressed promptly.
* The security team has provided training and support to the development team on how to securely store and retrieve secrets using Hashicorp Vault.
